‚ö¨ C A R E ‚¨ù I N S T R U C T I O N S ‚ö¨

Most jewelry pieces, regardless of what they are made from can follow the same basic care instructions.

‚¨ùProperly ‚¨ù Store ‚¨ù Your ‚¨ù Jewelry‚¨ù

The most common mistake is storing your jewelry in the bathroom, simply because it‚Äôs convenient. Keep your jewelry stored in a cool dry place that avoids moisture, chemicals, or body care products. A jewelry box lined with velvet works great and can help keep your pieces organized. Or try a ziploc bag with the air squeezed out.

‚¨ùAvoid ‚¨ù Water‚¨ù

Don‚Äôt wear your jewelry when swimming, showering, or when you‚Äôll be sweating on a hot day or working out. Water and sweat will tarnish your jewelry and quicken the oxidation process.

‚¨ùClean ‚¨ù Your ‚¨ù Jewelry‚¨ù

Most often, you can take a polishing cloth and gently wipe your jewelry clean. When more is needed, it is typically safe to clean your jewelry with warm water and a mild dish soap. Rinse thoroughly and dry completely.

item_name: Beautiful custom handmade viking forged axe, Groomsmen gift , Birthday Gift, collectibles axe , Gift for him , Anniversary gift for husband
desc:
Material Used On Axe:

Handle Material: Wood And Leather Wrap
Blade Material: Carbon Steel

More Detail Of Axe:

Length Of Axe: 19.5 Inches
Blade Length: 6 Inches
Blade Thickness: 1.25 Inches
Carry Type: Everyday Carry
Locking Mechanism: Non
Cover Of Blade: Leather Sheath
History Of Axe:

This Axe is an early type of battle axe, primarily used during the transition between European
Viking age and early Middle Ages.

Construction
The blade itself was reasonably light and forged very thin, making it superb for cutting.
The thickness of the body on top the edge is as thin as 2 mm. Many of these axes were constructed with a
reinforced bit, typically of a higher carbon steel to facilitate a harder, sharper edge. Average weight of an
axe this size is between 1 and 2 kg (2.2 and 4.4 lb). Proportionally, the long axe has more in common with a
modern meat cleaver than a wood axe. This complex construction (i.e. forged thin and incorporating a harder
type of steel near the edge) results in a lively and quick product with devastating cutting ability.

Custom Orders Detail:
If you want any type of custom axes, it will take 7 to 14 days right after payment
confirmation. I will consider the suggestion. As you can understand after customization the axe will not
be similar to the one you see in the pictures because of your requirements. But i ensure you the quality
will not change. During creating my axe product I care much for the quality regarding your order.
I also customize blades. For example with symbols, images, runes, and etc. You decide what to you would like to etch on blade.
This will be the most ever astonishing gift for your loved one's.

More Detail:
This axe is used for cutting tools, throwing axe game, for camping and for decorations.

item_name: Hand Woven Balearic Sling made from Jute Twine.
desc:
I have been making slings since 2002. What this means for you is that the slings have the quality that only time can produce.

Along with that, I have made hundreds of slings in over 20 different styles. What this means for you is that you are getting the best versions of the slings I am offering, not something cool I just learned.

I only offer slings that I would use myself. This means that they have to fit my requirements. That is, they must be easy to carry. They must last through a lot of use. They must look good. They must break into a great feel. And most importantly, they must have a ‚Äúwow factor‚Äù when you show your friends.

All slings are shipped crisp and fresh to you. After you get a few sessions of slinging in with your new sling, it will break in and conform to your hand and preferred throwing style.

Now onto the sling pictured above!

The Balearic islanders were some of the best slingers in the ancient world. They had legendary accuracy and were trained from childhood. This sling is styled after their slings. This sling is special in that the cord lengths are set up, so you hook the handle cord over your pointer or first finger and grip the trigger cord in your full hand. This goes along with the more traditional way of throwing. Also, because these were used for artillery and volley fire in ancient warfare, they had to hold larger and heavier ammo.

These slings come in two thicknesses. The 10 string and the 25 string. That represents the number of strands at the start of the braiding process. Then it will be folded over and woven into a 5-strand braid that is either 20 or 50 strings thick. I find the 10-string to be easier to use, but the 25-string is more accurate to historical slings.

I make these slings 26-27 inches to the pouch. Let me know if you would like yours longer or shorter.

The 25-strand Sling is 7/8th of an inch thick at its thickest point and tapers down to around 1/2 an inch.

the 10-strand sling is around 1/2 an inch at its thickest point and tapers down to 3/8 of an inch at its thinnest point.

item_name: Professional Longarm Quilting - Computerized and Free Motion - Fast, Friendly, Remote Mail-In Service. SEE DESCRIPTION for more information
desc:
**CURRENT TURNAROUND: Shipped back within 7-14 days***

Congratulations! You have completed your quilt top! And I would love the opportunity to help you turn it into an actual quilt that can be used by you or gifted and enjoyed for years to come. I provide quality personalized service with fast turn-around at a reasonable price. With thousands of designs to choose from, together we can find the perfect one with which to finish your quilt.

This listing is for a DEPOSIT on edge-to-edge (E2E) longarm quilting services performed by me on one or more quilt top(s). Once you have completed your purchase, just download the intake form(s), fill one out for each quilt top you are sending, place in box with quilt and mail to:

Kerry Franklin
6018 Chickadee Cir
Spring Hill, TN 37174

Please be sure to package your quilt top to protect it from inclement weather during shipping.

Upon receipt, I will contact you on Etsy or email to discuss design, thread color, etc. There are a myriad of designs to select from, and I am happy to help you in your choice. Once quilting has been completed, I will invoice you for the balance prior to shipping.

I have over 30 years experience as a quilter, and have posted a few photos of some quilting designs as examples, but many more are available.

The charges outlined below cover quilting, thread, and return shipping by Priority Mail.

Calculations will be as follows, with MINIMUM QUILTING charge of $50.00:

W x L = ___ sq in x $0.025 = $_______quilting charge for medium density E2E in design of your choice (approximately 1‚Äù between quilting lines)

W x L = ___ sq in x $0.030 = $______ quilting charge for medium-density E2E design with custom border, or high-density E2E design.

I love Quilter's Dream batting, and carry 100% cotton, or 80/20 cotton/polyester blend at $0.005 per sq. inch. Others are available upon request.

If any repairs to the quilt top are required, additional charges may apply, but these will be discussed with and approved by you before work begins.

Please see below for a summary of how it all works, and feel free to message me with any further questions you may have.

HOW IT WORKS

1. Complete your purchase. This represents your DEPOSIT for quilting services on one or more quilts. It is refundable until charges are estimated and approved by you, and work has commenced. Minimum QUILTING charge is $50.00.

2. After purchase is complete, you will have access to a downloadable digital file. This will serve as your intake form, with additional information on the back. Please complete and include in the package with your quilt. Any questions? Just shoot me a message, and I'm more than happy to help.

3. Ship your quilt top, backing fabric, and order form to me, AND PLEASE MESSAGE ME AT TIME OF SHIPPING, so we can track shipping and anticipate delivery. Once received, it will be safe with me in my smoke-free studio, until quilted and shipped back to you.

4. Upon receipt, I will confirm measurements, etc., contact you via Etsy convo or e-mail to discuss quilting design and thread color, and respond to any additional questions you may have.

5. When all the details are finalized, I will send you an estimate for the completion of your quilt. Upon your agreement to that estimate, I will begin quilting, and your deposit will become nonrefundable.

6. When your quilt is finished, I will provide an invoice to you for the balance, and once it is received, I will ship your completed quilt to you via Priority mail.

IMPORTANT NOTES:

1. Backing must be 8 inches wider and longer than your quilt top, so 4 inches more on all four sides. If it is pieced, please run the seam horizontally, and press the seam open

2. For best results, press your quilt top well, making sure it is square and lies flat, with measurements across the top, middle, and bottom all being approximately equal. Waves, fullness and puckers on your top may result in less than optimal results. Please mark the top with a safety pin.

3. If you are new to this process, no worries. Just contact me with questions; I am here to help.

Thank you for your interest in my shop! I am excited to begin working with you on your quilt, to finish your labor of love. Let‚Äôs get started!

item_name: Kintsugi Bowl, Kintsugi Lapis Blue Bowl, Kintsugi Pottery, Holiday Decor, Home Decor, Kintsugi Kit, Kintsugi Dark Blue Lapis Bowl
desc:
This beautiful Kintsugi bowl has a beautiful dark blue lapis color scheme that contrasts perfectly with the gold. This gold repair art piece has been created with our custom Kintsugi technique and inlaid with gold lining. This stunning piece reminds us of the dark blue of crashing ocean waves. Secure your piece today, spread the cosmic feelings of Lapis Lazuli and bring tranquillity to your space.

Dimensions:
6.25‚Äù W x 2.75‚Äù H

About Kintsugi: The Art of Kintsugi is when broken pottery is repaired, with gold, silver, or brass filling the seams. This metaphor represents us when we are broken...we can heal and become stronger, wiser, and more beautiful when we mend. We have a more valuable life with knowledge gained from experience. We become better than before. Note: Each of our pieces are broken and repaired using our custom Kintsugi method, and each one is unique as they all break differently. Each piece will have its own unique imperfections and flaws, and will look different from what is pictured in the listing. No two products are alike. However, we will gladly send you a picture of your unique item before it is shipped, upon request! **For Decorative Purposes Only, Not Food or Liquid Safe.

**Upon special request we will add extra sealant to make your piece water tight. Please just send us a message!

item_name: Custom Layered Paper Bathymetric Map | Personalized Map Art | Wall Art for Lake House | Retirement Present | Thoughtful Gift for Parents
desc:
Keep the places you love close by with a hand-made, layered paper, bathymetric map.

This intricate paper-cut map is custom-designed around the body of water you choose. These unique maps are thoughtful gifts and make an eye-catching addition to any home. From your favorite fishing spot to a sunken ship to the location of an important event, your choices are unlimited.

Once you choose the location, we‚Äôll start creating your map. We research the requested area and then use high-quality card stock to recreate the map in intricate layers. We can even mark a specific location of a house, camp, etc on the map.

After you place the order, send a message with details about your request. Here‚Äôs the info I‚Äôll need to start on your order:

1. The name of the body of water you want featured. A link to the map or coordinates is especially helpful. If there are specific things you want included or excluded, please specify (nearby smaller lakes, a specific coastline, etc).
2. A specific location you would like highlighted on the map. This is optional, but many people include GPS coordinates for their cottage, camp, or home. If you don‚Äôt already have the coordinates, but would like them included, I only need an address or screenshot of the location to get them for you.
3. How you want the highlighted location marked. You don‚Äôt have to mark it with anything, but many people choose to do this. We have seen all sorts of markers, from a traditional dot, house, or heart, to a fish, a boat, and more.
4. The way you want the name and coordinates displayed on the map. By default, we use the layout below, so let us know if you want something different. You can also specify the name you want (Skead vs Greater Sudbury, etc).

Lake Name
City, State
Coordinates

5. The color of frame you prefer. Our frames are handmade and available in the colors pictured in the listing photos. Pick one and include your choice here.

This project is all about you, so if you have any specific requests for customizations (color scheme, etc.), just send me a message, and we can discuss the details. Delivery time is 2-3 weeks to allow for the custom creation of your map.

A mandala (emphasis on first syllable; Sanskrit ‡§Æ‡§£‡•ç‡§°‡§≤, ma·πá·∏çala ‚Äì literally "circle") is a spiritual and ritual symbol in Hinduism and Buddhism, representing the universe.[1] In common use, "mandala" has become a generic term for any diagram, chart or geometric pattern that represents the cosmos metaphysically or symbolically; a microcosm of the universe.

The basic form of most mandalas is a square with four gates containing a circle with a center point. Mandalas often have radial balance.

The below Mandala is called Mantra Mandala ( Om Ma ne Pad me Hun )

O·πÉ ma·πái padme h≈´·πÉ(Sanskrit: ‡•ê ‡§Æ‡§£‡§ø‡§™‡§¶‡•ç‡§Æ‡•á ‡§π‡•Ç‡§Å, IPA: [√µÀêÀê m…ô…≥ip…ôdÃ™meÀê …¶≈©Àê]) is the six-syllabled Sanskrit mantra particularly associated with the four-armed Shadakshari form of Avalokiteshvara (Tibetan: ‡Ω¶‡æ§‡æ±‡Ωì‡ºã‡Ω¢‡Ω¶‡ºã‡ΩÇ‡Ωü‡Ω≤‡ΩÇ‡Ω¶‡ºã Chenrezig, Chinese: ËßÄÈü≥ Guanyin, Japanese: Ë¶≥Èü≥„Åã„Çì„ÅÆ„Çì Kannon or Kanzeon, Mongolian: –ú—ç–≥–∂–∏–¥ –ñ–∞–Ω—Ä–∞–π—Å–∏–≥ Migjid Janraisig), the bodhisattva of compassion

The first word Om is a sacred syllable found in Indian religions. The word Mani means "jewel" or "bead", Padme is the "lotus flower" (the Buddhist sacred flower), and Hum represents the spirit of enlightenment.[2][3]

It is commonly carved onto rocks, known as mani stones, or else it is written on paper which is inserted into prayer wheels. When an individual spins the wheel, it is said that the effect is the same as reciting the mantra as many times as it is duplicated within the wheel.

Mushroom is made from local wood, Jempinis wood. Part of the base of this statue is made of Parasite wood. Parasite wood is a very unique type of wood.

Parasite wood is formed as a defense mechanism by a host tree overgrown by a parasite. This defense grows into unique wood called parasite wood. Back then, this wood was only used as firewood, but our skilled artists create beautiful art from it.

As the finishing touch, we choose to use a clear coat , to maintain the natural color of the wood. This statue is perfect for decorating your home or as a gift for loved ones.

This statue is handcrafted by expert Balinese carving artists. Each statue is a unique and special masterpiece, second to none.

item_name: AUTOMATIC Sand Bowl - Zen Graden - Relaxing Mind - Sand Art - Automatic Sand Bowl - Zen Garden
desc:
This product is intended for use in the United States with a voltage of 120v. If this product is being used outside of the United States, it may require a step-down converter/transformer. Do not plug in the device until the appropriate adapter is established. EU/UK/AU uses 220v and will need an adapter. The converter is not simply a US-to-International ‚Äúplug‚Äù converter, rather, it is a voltage converter.

This sand art bowl can create over 80 designs completely customized by you! Its soothing, enchanting patterns can help you relax and de-stress your mind. A small metal ball gently glides across the fine sand to create endless symmetrical designs in the sand as you relax.

Instructions to get started:
1) Remove the device from its packaging.
2) Place the device on a sturdy flat surface near an electrical outlet, safe for pets and small children (I recommend placing the device on a plate or tray if the surface has a tablecloth in case the motor fails). hot).
3) Pour about 2 tablespoons of sand on the top surface and spread evenly with a fork (it is recommended to make a thin layer to cover the entire surface. Use a combined scraper to tap the sides of the bowl until smooth.)
4) Put a metal ball in the middle of the sand
5) Plug the power cable into the outlet and turn on the switch to ensure that the cable is not tangled and there is no risk of tripping.
6) The ball will attach to the magnet underneath the cap and start creating a design.
7) Now, sit back and enjoy.

Size:
- Diameter: 8.65 inches
- Height: 2.85 inches


Featured:
- 6ft . power cord
- Non-slip rubber feet
- Extra metal ball
- ON / OFF switch
- Made from glossy black PLA plastic

Engine specifications are:
- Life cycle 10,000 hours.
- Voltage: AC 100-127 V
- Frequency: 50/60Hz


The product is designed for AC 120V and 50/60Hz according to US standards. For international orders using 220V, an adapter will be required. Please check your country's voltage before plugging in the device.

!!Note: The bowl is not meant to run 24/7. Make sure you turn it off if you will be away for a long time

item_name: The Modern Day Briefcase
desc:
Our company, Alliance Trading Group (www.allitra.com), has been the Breton Company's production partner since 2017. ATG owns the title and the rights to the Breton Company's inventory of Modern Day Briefcases, along with their digital assets and branding. We are offering Etsy customers these bags at a 50% discount!

This modern bag combines the comfort and convenience of a backpack, with the professional appeal of a high-end satchel or briefcase.

The waxed canvas briefcase backpack is designed with two leather handles to make it easy and comfortable to carry into a business meeting or around your workplace. The bag has padded shoulder straps and a padded laptop sleeve to make it comfortable to carry on your back. The modern interior of the briefcase backpack has a secure laptop sleeve to keep your computer from bouncing around when you are on the move. The bag also has 8 internal pockets to store anything you need when you are on the go.

This bag also works great for traveling, as it includes a luggage sleeve on the back of the bag, so it easily slides onto luggage handles when you need to run through an airport or slip onto a subway.

Breton makes all of Its products from durable, water-resistant waxed canvas and the best Italian leather in the world. These materials are incredibly durable and will age exceptionally well, making your bag more and more beautiful with each year of use.

To top it off, the bag has YKK zippers that will last for years under the harshest treatment.

The Breton backpack briefcase comes in two different sizes: regular and small.

REGULAR: 17 inches tall, 12 inches wide, and 5.5 inches deep, and it will fit up to a 17-inch laptop.
SMALL: 15 inches tall, 11 inches wide, and 4.5 inches deep, and will fit up to a 13-inch laptop.

item_name: The Great Wave off Kanagawa of Wood Case ( For iPhone 14 Pro Max 13 Pro 11 12 Xs SE XR ,Samsung Galaxy S22 21 A73 A53, Google Pixel 6 7Pro )
desc:
About The Engraving.

The Great Wave off Kanagawa (Japanese: Á•ûÂ•àÂ∑ùÊ≤ñÊµ™Ë£è, Hepburn: Kanagawa-oki Nami Ura, lit. "Under the Wave off Kanagawa"), also known as The Great Wave or The Wave, is a woodblock print by the Japanese ukiyo-e artist Hokusai. It was created in 1831 in the late Edo period as the first print in Hokusai's series Thirty-six Views of Mount Fuji. The image depicts an enormous wave threatening three boats off the coast in the Sagami Bay (Kanagawa Prefecture) while Mount Fuji rises in the background. Sometimes assumed to be a tsunami, the wave is more likely to be a large rogue wave. This is a public domain work.



Order & Delivery.

‚ñ∂ Regular order: 1-2 days processing time (non-customized/personalized).

‚úé Custom/personalized order: 1-2 days processing time after proof confirmed.

‚úà ETA: 1-2 weeks to USA, UK & EU, Worldwide 8-25 days (Excluding remote cities such as The USA of Hawaii, Alaska, Puerto Rico, Maryland & APO/FPO/DPO addresses, they might take more than 25 days.)
Note: If Pick-up/Delivery notifications are available on your local couriers, you can put your phone number in the order note.

Key Features.

‚òë The surface is made of genuine wood and the bumper is made of soft TPU.

‚òë The engraving is burned into the wood with a high-power laser, without printing and coloring.

‚òë Compatible with regular wireless charging (QI), MagSafe (Magnetic) option available on some iPhone models

‚òë The front edges around the screen were raised a bit to protect the screen. (Note that on certain Samsung and Google models with a curved edge screen, this lip is reduced. I would suggest using a protective film.)

‚òë Note - Under natural light conditions, the actual color of Blackwood will be close to a brownish black. as this is a natural product, the grain and engraving may differ from the illustrations. But that is exactly what makes each case unique.

‚òë I offer a one-year warranty.


Customization:

‚ñ£ Add personalized texts to my designs:

You can add a personalized text engravings to all the designs in my store. To personalize your case. just leave a message with the text (quote/phrase / can be any language ) you want engraved when submitting your order or send me a message directly via ‚ÄúEtsy Messages‚Äù.

‚ñ£ Engrave your own designs or images
Step 1: Reach out to me via Etsy Messages. Send me the image you want to engrave (the file can be in any format), and specify your phone model. If your file can't be attached via Etsy Messages, please send it to my email address: guiji [!at] carveit.art

Step 2: I will create a rendering of the engraving (proof) for you and reply to your message within 24 hours after receiving your image (excluding weekends). Considering the hand drawing step, some complex graphics may take longer for me to process. After receiving my response, you can decide to continue with the order or provide suggestions for further changes (please note that each of your modification requests may take up to 24 hours to process). If the rendering(proof) doesn't meet your expectations, you can cancel the order or provide a new image with no additional cost.

Step 3: Note down my ‚ÄúProof and Layout number‚Äù , when submitting your order, you will need to include the "Proof and Layout number " or the word ‚ÄúCUSTOM‚Äù so that I know this is a custom item. ( please check the wood color and phone model in your order carefully ).
This is the listing for submitting custom orders. üîó


Note: Etsy has delivery time requirements, even for custom orders. If you submit an order before sending me the custom image, you need to confirm the information promptly after receiving my "engraving proof". If you do not confirm or request modifications within 48 hours, I will confirm the design and make the product for you based on my personal preferences. Thank you for your support and understanding.

Tips for the wood colors:
If we are engraving for effect rather than for personal color preference, Rosewood is often the most stable choice in my experience because it shows a higher contrast and makes the engraving appear more clear after engraving,. Cherry wood has a high contrast as well, but it has natural black wood grains and may have some spots. Walnut and Blackwood are darker in color, which means that the engraving will be closer to the color of the wood, making the design less marked and noticeable. ( This is the video to show you the wood color & laser-etched details. üîó )

I offer an additional option to make your engraving more visible.
Considering this is an etching process (the engraving is burned into the wood with a high-power laser ), It is pure engraving without printing and coloring. The visibility of engraving entirely depends on the wood colors (wood species); It will be more visible on Rosewood and Cherry wood, while Blackwood and walnuts are secondary. But there another option I provided is I can make your engraving more visible(more black) by using "Black ink (or Acrylic Paint) " This is a free additional service, and I will not do it until you ask since not everybody accepts using ink/pigment on engraving. ( I posted a video to show you my laser engraving and inking service. üîó )
üìù #To use this additional service. you can leave "Stained Black" in your order note.

‚óè MATERIALS ‚óè

The special point of our pride is the Italian distressed leather we use in our craft. It is made from best pieces of calfskin which are carefully selected by hand. It is so special because of its improved tenderness and elasticity, ideal thickness (2-3 mm), natural scars and scratches, soft grade changes of color and of course silk touch.

Just like human fingerprint, each piece of leather is unique with its own, one of kind pattern, natural scars and color shades! In the process of use, you will find out that each new scratch is a new story and the more you use the item, the more attractive looks. All these properties make vintage leather perfect with all its imperfections, give each items its own character and charm!

‚óè OPTIONS ‚óè

Leather My Skin is not only about the way you look, but also about the way you feel! This is the reason why all our items can be personalized and upgraded in different ways to meet all your highest expectations!

‚óè DELIVERY ‚óè

Current production time is 1-3 business days. Once your leather goods are ready, delivery terms are 7 business days to the USA and approx. 5-12* days internationally.

*This is a rough estimate, it usually takes less or more time depending on your geographic location, availability or weather conditions as well as the customs inspection.

Do you need your order faster? Priority shipping (3-5 business days) is available for you!
Please, enter your phone number if express shipping is required .

‚óè WHO WE ARE ‚óè

Just as legendary Beatles ( hope it sounds not too presumptuous :) we are all classmates, simple guys with different tempers, degree levels, goals in life, but only leathercraft is our true passion and we decided to share it with world! So, if you are looking for a high-quality product that will last for ages and is made by leather-addicted team - then you are at the right place. Feel free to contact us!

item_name: adult lunch box | personalize lunch bag | lunch box to personalize | teacher lunchbox | porta pranzo | leather lunch bag | lunch tote
desc:
The Hydration Flask x Lunch Bag Bundle

The Hydration Flask
Our T|W Hydration Flask is the perfect bottle on the go. The slim design allows for easy carry, taking up very little space! Carry your water, juice, or adult beverages wherever you go. It was designed to fit perfectly in the T|W lunch bag and match its sleek design.

Dimensions: 7.25"h x 5.0"w x 1.0"d
Size: 14.2oz
The Hydration flask cannot be monogrammed but your lunch bag can.

The Lunch Bag
"This bag looks so good everyone is shocked when I tell them its my lunch bag " ~ Customer Review

The Sorrel lunch tote is made with cruelty-free vegan leather and has a sleek modern look, allowing your lunch bag to blend with any outfit and compliment your personal style like no other lunch bag on the market. The brown interior redefines the way you bring your lunch. Each tote is hand-sewn and allows you to carry hot and cold items in the insulated compartments. The handles for the lunch bag are durable and more than capable of holding a full day's worth of meals. Each lunch bag is unisex for males and females and has a comfortable shoulder strap. Be prepared for questions and compliments about your lunch bag.

Long Term Thermal Insulation - Double layered insulation provides excellent protection to your containers and keeps food & drinks warm or cold and fresh for 4 to 6 hours. The interior lining is a soft food grade premium PVC which means you can place food and fruits directly in the bag.

Easy to Carry - Weighing only 1.7 pounds, the bag has reinforced dual handles for a solid grip. It includes a detachable shoulder strap that adjusts from 58" max to 35" min for a hands-free carrying experience.

Extremely Durable & Premium Materials - We use heavy-duty vegan leather connected by dense double stitching, making the bag extremely strong. Reinforced metal zippers ensure smooth opening and closing.

Spacious & Multi Compartments Overall measurement - 10.0"h x 9.4"w x 5.5"d is designed for maximum storage.

The top compartment - 5"h x 10"w x 6.5"d. It is great for storing a water bottle and fruit.
Bottom compartment - 5" h x 7.5 "w x 6.5"d; perfect for your meal containers, and has an extra pocket for an ice pack.
Internal zippered pocket - ideal for keeping non-food items separate from your lunch.
External zippered pocket - On the back of the bag is perfect for easy access to your cell phone or keys.

Quality Promise - T|W tote stands behind its products. If a product fails from a defect in the material or workmanship, we will replace it for free.

~ General Information ~

Returns
Returns or exchanges are offered within the contiguous United States on all tote purchases, unless otherwise noted. This offer is valid for one return or exchange per order. Personalized/Monogrammed totes are considered final sale merchandise and cannot be returned.

Customization Info
We can engrave a "Name" or "Initials" on the bag. Our traditional engraving location is "centered on the bottom pocket" of the lunch bag in our Garamond font. The T|W at the top of the bag is our standard logo.

Please add your engraving request to the ‚ÄúAdd your personalization‚Äù box and be double-check to make sure the number of characters does not exceed the number of characters allowed.

Delivery Details
We use USPS & UPS shipping services. We provide tracking numbers to all our customers.

Delivery Time
USA - 2-3 business days
Customized items may require 1 or 2 more days to ship.

International - You will get an estimated shipping time at check out based on your region. The processes of customs are not related to our shop. The items may be delivered later than the expected time because of customs process.

Note 1:
Please keep in mind that this is a handmade item and may slightly differ from the photos. Also, because we use high-grade premium quality vegan leather, some wrinkling is normal.

Most jewelry pieces, regardless of what they are made from can follow the same basic care instructions.

‚¨ùProperly ‚¨ù Store ‚¨ù Your ‚¨ù Jewelry‚¨ù

The most common mistake is storing your jewelry in the bathroom, simply because it‚Äôs convenient. Keep your jewelry stored in a cool dry place that avoids moisture, chemicals, or body care products. A jewelry box lined with velvet works great and can help keep your pieces organized. Or try a ziploc bag with the air squeezed out.

‚¨ùAvoid ‚¨ù Water‚¨ù

Don‚Äôt wear your jewelry when swimming, showering, or when you‚Äôll be sweating on a hot day or working out. Water and sweat will tarnish your jewelry and quicken the oxidation process.

‚¨ùClean ‚¨ù Your ‚¨ù Jewelry‚¨ù

Most often, you can take a polishing cloth and gently wipe your jewelry clean. When more is needed, it is typically safe to clean your jewelry with warm water and a mild dish soap. Rinse thoroughly and dry completely.

‚óºÔ∏è FULL GRAIN LEATHER ‚óºÔ∏è

Our exceptional high quality leather products are produced with Full Grain leather due to its thick pull-up leather attributes. Full grain leather is known to be the topmost layer of the cowhide, the most durable and highly valued skin of the animal. In comparison to genuine leather, full grain leather is very durable and long-lasting. Over time and usage, full grain leather ages to become soft and supple, resulting in a product that is able to withstand daily wear and tear, while providing an exceptional luxury experience.

‚óºÔ∏è LIFETIME WARRANTY ‚óºÔ∏è

We believe in products that stand out in the crowd. As a customer, once you start using one of our products, over time you will notice the leather change its appearance to a more mature and an aged look. This ageing of the leather not only makes it more flexible, but also strengthens the material overtime. Due to this natural property of full grain leather, our products are not only waterproof, but also dust proof and can withstand rough usage as well.

We are confident in the material and the production of our leather products. We provide a lifetime warranty for all of our products to cover the breaks or any hardware related issues. Simply contact us if you have any issues, and we will repair or replace! This is our lifetime promise.

‚óºÔ∏è CAN'T FIND WHAT YOU'RE LOOKING FOR? ‚óºÔ∏è

Genuine leather with a specific color usually has slightly different shades and textures as you move across the leather. Therefore, the wallet that you will receive might be slightly different in tone or texture from the listing pictures.

ATTN: All engraving pictures in our listing such as the initials, sentence, and image are examples. If you want your order to be engraved like the listing sample, you should pay for that based on the variation that you choose.


=================================================
‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶ Product Features ‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶
=================================================

‚ú¶ Made of high-quality cowhide leather.

=================================================
‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶ PERSONALIZED NAME & INITIALS ‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶
=================================================

When submitting your order, please leave a note at the checkout, in the message box in the bottom left corner, providing:

1) Any word/sentence/initials requested for personalization should be inside quotes. The quotation marks will not be engraved unless requested by the customer. Anything inside the quotes will be engraved exactly on the wallet. We will not contact customers for possible typos.

2) You can choose the font for your personalization in the last two pictures and tell us your choice in the ‚Äúnote to seller‚Äù at the checkout. If the fonts are not specified in the note to the seller, we will engrave initials in Times font and sentences in Cursive font. The font size used depends on the location and length of the personalization. It is not necessarily the same font size you see in the pictures.

3) The location of each message on the wallet (You can choose the available locations in the 8th picture and tell us your choice in the ‚Äúnote to seller‚Äù at the checkout).

4) For the front of the wallet, usually, engraved initials/monograms are composed of two or three characters. If you want the sentence in front, we can engrave it up to 35 characters.
Also, your secret messages can be engraved on the inside of the wallet for up to 60 characters. The back location of the wallet can be engraved with your message up to 35 characters too.

5) For personalization in Style 4 and Style 5, normally the last name initial is bigger than the two other initials (first name and middle name) and is placed in the middle. Considering this, please tell us in the "note to seller" what order you want your initials to appear in the wallet?
For example: Adam Bryan Cole
Standard initials: ABC
Style 4 and Style 5 initials: ACB ( C bigger than A and B)

6) If you would like a logo/design/handwriting/picture engraved on the wallet, please choose the ‚Äúyour own design/your own handwriting‚Äù option when submitting your order and send us a high-quality picture of the design through Etsy message. For engraving handwriting, please write your message on a piece of white paper preferably with a black sharpie, take a high-resolution picture of it and send it to us through Etsy messages.

7) We do not engrave trademarks such as sports logos due to copyright infringement laws.

‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶ We Can Personalize Your Order With Any Design That You Want. Please Leave Us Your Instructions. We Love Assisting Customers!‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶

The natural nature of products such as towels and bathrobes that directly contact your skin eliminates risks such as allergic reactions. ... Organic towels and bathrobes that offer an extra softness will leave a more pleasant impression on your skin and make you feel more comfortable.

‚ô• HISTORY OF TURKISH TOWELS

The origins of Turkish towels date to about the 7th century A.D. and entwine with the Turkish bathhouses, known as hammans. ‚ô• WHAT MAKES TURKISH COTTON SO FAMOUS IN THE WORLD
Absorbent and quick-drying, Turkish cotton has extra long fibers, which makes it super soft and luxurious. Considered one of the finest textiles, Turkish cotton is grown and harvested exclusively in the Turkish region. Turkish cotton terry has large thread loops that make it highly absorbent.

Each towel you will buy is going to support families in small village of turkey and have this beautiful woven culture continue for our kids to enjoy those soft towels in the future and support one of the major culturel product of my town here in Denizli .

item_name: Castor-Grade #1-Cured and Aged Beaver Castors-Pheromones-Musk-Perfume & Incense ingredient.
desc:
Beaver Castors-Grade number 1 Beaver Castors, cured for 1 year- Musk, Aphrodisiac-Pheremones.

This listing is for cured Beaver Castors. Aged for one year and ready to tincture for incense or perfume. These are whole Castor sacs and will be cut to the weight you require. If you want the whole pair of Castor sacs, just leave me a note with your order. Most pairs of sacs are over 25 grams and under 75 grams.

They can be tinctured as-is in 95% alcohol for the preparation of Castoreum. Whole sacs can be roughly chopped and yield themselves easily to the alcohol.

This cured Castor is prepared from the dried and aged scent glands of Castor Canadensis, the North American Beaver.

Castor sacs can be tinctured in alcohol for 1 to 6 months and filtered for use in perfume and incense. I find the aroma of the maceration continues to evolve for at least 6 months. They are often tinctured at a ratio of 1 part Castors to 9 parts alcohol for a 10% tincture.

A Castor "Absolute" can be prepared by evaporating the alcohol from the Castor tincture.

Castor sacs have been used for hundreds if not thousands of years in traditional medicine and fragrance arts. They are considered an aphrodisiac and an attractant to both genders. In traditional medicine systems, they were used as an anti-inflammatory, antipyretic, and to treat hormonal imbalances.

Both Beaver genders possess a pair of castor sacs and a pair of anal glands located in two cavities under the skin between the pelvis and the base of the tail. The castor sacs are not true glands (endocrine or exocrine) on a cellular level. Hence references to these structures as preputial glands or castor glands are misnomers. (Wikipedia).

The scent drawn from the glands is rich, deep, leathery and woodsy, smokey and sultry. It is a base note and fixative in mainstream and natural perfumery.

Government agencies supervise Beaver trapping in Canada to limit the damage caused by beavers while maintaining a healthy ecosystem and animal population. Inhumane steel leg-hold traps are banned in Ontario and most other provinces.
Beavers are traditionally trapped for their versatile waterproof fur, not for their scent glands.

Beaver trapping has been an important part of many North American aboriginal cultures, where a reverence for nature and her animals is an integral part of traditional hunting and trapping practices.



Dan

item_name: Lotion-Solid Lotion Bars
desc:
Our lotion bars were featured on BuzzFeed on their must have when traveling list.


Hard lotion bars are essentially the same as liquid lotion except they are hard at room temperature. The warmth of your skin "activates" meaning once the the lotion is applied to your skin your natural body heat warms up the bar. this softens the bar which allows it to glide on smoothly. The ingredients I use are rich and moisturizing for your skin.

During the warmer months the lotion bars can be tricky to ship. If your lotion bar arrives melted to to the heat or sitting in a mailbox for extended periods, put in the fridge for a couple hours, the lotion bar will harden back up. You may lose the bee design but it will be a s good as new.

Pearberry: A delightful, juicy blend of luscious pear, boysenberry, ripe raspberry and blackberry.

Lavender Cedar: A floral-woody top notes of lavender essential oil open the fragrance, along with natural oils of cedar leaf and rosemary. In addition continues with pure lavandin and cedarwood oils.

Vanilla Chai: Vanilla chai is made up of shaved coconut, sticky maple syrup, golden butter, and white chocolate tea blended with warm holiday spices and vanilla rum. This scent is also available is lotion and sugar body scrub as well.

Sandalwood: Sandalwood is one of the most alluring, scents you will ever smell. This fragrance adds a woody, lush and sensual note.

Coconut: This coconut has a rich and exotic blend of notes. The top note is a traditional sweet coconut with mid-notes of vanilla and almond.

Bergamot & Orange: Bursting juices of orange come to life with energetic splashes of grapefruit. Blooming petals of orange flower and a hint of patchouli add depth and longevity to this beautiful creation. Essential Oils used in this blend: Orange, Spearmint, Bitter Orange * Our original scent was discontinued from the manufacturer we are now using this new blend.

Summer Breeze: A blend of strawberry and raspberry, peach, pineapple, cherry blossom and white Jasmine. This scent is also available is lotion and sugar body scrub as well.

Beach: A gorgeous day at the beach complete with warm sand, sea spray, salt, jasmine and mandarin. This scent is also available is lotion and sugar body scrub as well.

Patchouli: Patchouli Dark EO is an essential oil with an earthy aroma with light fruity notes. The smell of patchouli is typically described as a mix of earthy, woody, sweet, and musky scents. The smell of pure patchouli oil is quite strong and is slightly sweet and spicy. It has been described as an intoxicating scent.

Bourbon & Cedarwood: This smokey, spiced bourbon fragrance is dark and sophisticated, blended with cedarwood essential oil which has an earthy, woodsy and slightly sweet scent.

Stress Relief: Top notes of peppermint and spearmint are believed to reduce fatigue and increase mental alertness. Essential oils of lavender, clary sage,and juniper berry are considered to be calming and uplifting to the spirit. Additional accent notes include laurel leaf, coriander, mandarin, and menthol.

Compare to Tom Ford.

Lavender: Scented with Lavender essential oil

Island Escape: A sweet tropical scents. It's a blend of tamarind, mandarin, red currant, date, and coconut milk.It smells amazing!

Oatmeal, Milk & Honey: Oatmeal, Honey and Cream combine to make this fragrance a favorite.

Apple Spice: A combination of Crisp Apples, Cinnamon, orange and clove.

Lavender Mint: Lavender and mint essential oils

Blood Orange: Scented with blood orange essential oil

Lilac: Scented with a heady fresh lilac fragrance oil

Winters Moon: We found ourselves in the snow, feeling and hearing the mounds of snow crunching under our boots. We could smell the sticky pine sap as we passed the pine forest covered in a carpet of rust-colored pine needles. We smelled freshly lit fireplaces from neighboring villages and the cranberries and spices that were simmering on someone's stove. Honey Citrus and Vanilla: Delicious creamy honey and hints of citrus with floral on top of vanilla musk and soft notes of caramel.

Made with a blend of peppermint, geranium, cedarwood,lemongrass and citronella essential oils.Made without any chemicals! This blend smells so good you may want to use it year round! item_name: Natural Bath Bombs with Epsom Salts - Bath Bomb, Moisturizing Freshly Handmade Bath Fizzy, Aromatherapy Bath Fizzies For Luxurious Bath Soak
desc:
Luxury Gift Box Set: https://www.etsy.com/listing/482670252/gift-box-set-bath-bombs-gift-basket-bath

When the kids are finally in bed, or you‚Äôre done with a very long day at work, what could possibly be better than sinking into a steamy hot tub of water for a long, and well-deserved, soak? We can think of only one thing‚Ä¶one of our blissful bath bombs with Epsom salts! Instantly, you‚Äôll be immersed in your own private mini-spa when the bath bomb meets the water, exploding with fragrance into a fizzy, massaging sensation that melts your cares away, soothes your soul, and pampers your body.

Gorgeous Soaps creates each scented bath bomb as an aromatherapeutic experience. Some have essential oil fragrances that refresh and rejuvenate, so you can keep on going with a positive attitude and alert mind. Some are stress-busters that bring peace and tranquillity to your mind, relieve tension and anxiety, and erase the stiffness that stress brings to your joints and muscles. Others carry you to the gates of dreamland, so when you step out of the tub, wrapped in a fluffy cotton towel, you are just one step away from the most restful sleep you‚Äôve had in years!

Our bath bombs are made from all-natural ingredients that are designed to be as nurturing to your skin as the scents are to your body, mind and emotions. Baking soda improves skin condition, soothes acne and pimples, relieves sunburn pain and sun damage, and smooths and softens skin. Citric acid is an alpha hydroxy acid, an anti-ageing ingredient that is designed to slough off old, dead and damaged skin layers to reveal the new, healthy, radiant skin underneath. Coconut oil is antibacterial for skin health, and moisturizing for restoring silky smooth skin. Cornstarch is anti-inflammatory, with vitamins and minerals that prevent irritation and increase elasticity with collagen. Epsom salts are added to relieve muscles and joints, reduce inflammation, tension and pain, and erase headaches, cramps and even your often overlooked and overworked feet! Together, they create the perfect blend as you dim the lights, lie back in the tub, close your eyes, and let the fizzing action carry you away!

We recommend that to keep your bath bombs at their peak effectiveness, it‚Äôs best to store them in a cool, dry place because moisture in the air can activate the fizzing. We also recommend that you use them within 6 months for maximum benefit; however, once you‚Äôve tried the first one, we‚Äôre sure there won‚Äôt be any left for that long! Gorgeous Soap Blissful Bath Bombs are a wonderful gift idea for friends and family; you‚Äôre giving them a gift of health, peace, and nurturing, like a mini-spa in a box!

Our bath bombs arrive shrink-wrapped to preserve freshness and bubble wrapped to prevent damage.

Each bath bomb weighs approximately 5.6 oz. and measures approximately 2.5 inches in diameter.

Ingredients: Epsom salts, sodium bicarbonate (baking soda), citric acid, coconut oil, fragrance &/or essential oils.

item_name: Letters to Broken People | a modern poetry book about relationships, heartbreak, and healing | signed edition
desc:
$2 off the list price! Each book comes signed, with an exclusive postcard. Orders may ship out sooner than Etsy estimate.

When a relationship ends, there is a sense of loss that is so shattering, it can be hard to make sense of as anything but grief. When the relationship ends because of infidelity, there is even more confusion, fear, and trauma. With emotional poetry and delicate drawings, Letters to Broken People takes the reader by the hand through the process of dealing with and healing from betrayal syndrome. By showing each stage of grief‚ÄîDenial, Anger, Bargaining, Depression, Reconnection, Acceptance, and Healing‚Äî this book teaches us that there is redemption, light, and true joy beyond our darkest days.

Part self-help book and part poetry, Letters to Broken People is a companion, a comforting voice, and a guide through the loneliest and most emotionally charged moments.

item_name: Fresh Cacao | RAW CHOCOLATE | Cocoa Pod | Tropical Fruit | Exotic Fruit | Fresh Fruit | Organic Fruit | Fruit
desc:
Cacao, is scientifically known as Theobroma Cacao. It is native to the tropical regions of South America. The Cacao we source is from Ecuador, specifically because of its fleshy and flavorful pulp. The cacao pod contains many beans that are surrounded by a delicious white pulp. It is used to make juices and jellies. The seed is fermented and ground as the main ingredient in chocolate.



********* WE SHIP OUT ORDERS ON MONDAY - WEDNESDAY FOR ORDERS PLACED THE WEEK BEFORE. IF POSSIBLE WE WILL SHIP IT OUT SOONER! *********



Return/Refund Policy ~ Due to perishability, returns on fresh fruit are NOT accepted. In the unfortunate event that fruit arrives in unacceptable conditions please email info [!at] fruithunters.com within 24 hours of receiving fruit with CLEAR photos of the product highlighting the issues. If the box arrives damaged and/or late please submit a shipping claim with Fedex and contact us as well at info [!at] fruithunters.com.



Ripening Guide:

Cacao is shipped ripe and is ready to eat upon delivery. To open the cacao pod, use a sharp knife to cut the pod in half. Inside the pod you will find the cacao beans covered in a delicious white pulp. You may consume both the bean and the pulp and compost the pods shell as it is inedible

desc:
A Variety Of Wax Seal Sets to Choose From. Please select the wax set based on the name mentioned in the images.

Trustela's Wax Seal Stamp Kit - Wax Seal Kit with 650pcs Wax Seal Beads, Sealing Wax Warmer, Envelopes, Wax Stamp, Wax Seal Spoon, Tea light Candles, Tweezers and Metallic Pen for Gifts, Letters, Crafts and Decoration Sealing


WAX STAMP KIT Trustela's wax seal stamp kit comes with 650 pieces of sealing wax beads in a variety of colors, wax seal warmer, tree of life wax seal stamp, sealing wax melting spoon, 4 tealight candles, 10 envelopes, 2 metallic pens and Tweezers.


WAX STAMP SEAL KIT contains good quality wax seal beads that are smokeless, odorless, non-toxic and melt easily that provide a perfect seal every time. Sealing Wax Kit has letter wax beads are in a variety of different colors including gold, red, rose, pink, turquoise, purple etc. Wax letter seal kit provides you a good selection of colors to meet all your wax stamp seals needs.


Wax Letter Seal Kit is an ALL In One wax seal stamp set. It comes with a wax stamp furnace that helps place the wax seal warmer melting spoon on the stove and allows the tea light candle lit at all times. Tweezers allow you to place seal wax beads without burning your hands. High quality brass letter wax seal stamp gives a sharp and crisp stamp each time which can be enhanced by using metallic pens.


LETTER SEALING WAX KIT is convenient to use with octagon shaped wick less beads. 3-4 wax beads will be enough to get a perfect seal for gifts, envelope, wedding invitations, bottle, graduation letters, Christmas gifts, maps, retro letters, manuscripts, parcels, cards, crafts, wine sealing, party invitations etc.


100% SATISFACTORY If you have any questions about the wax sealing kit then please feel free to contact us. We will do our best to solve it for you.


Trustela's Wax Stamp Set comes with 650 pieces of sealing wax beads in a variety of colors, wax seal warmer, tree of life wax seal stamp, sealing wax melting spoon, 4 tealight candles, 10 envelopes, 2 metallic pens and Tweezers.

How To Use Wax Seal Set:
1. Light the wick of the tea light candle and cover with the wax seal warmer.
2 . Put the spoon on the wax seal warmer and put 3-4 wax sealing beads into the spoon to melt.
3. Wait for the sealing wax to melt into liquid. Then pour the melted wax into a perfect circle in order to cover the whole stamp.
4. Let the wax cool down for around 15 sec and press the stamp on the wax.
5. Remove the wax stamp and always remember to blow out the candles after use for safety.
6. You can use the metallic pen to decorate the pattern of the stamp to make it more beautiful.

Sealing Wax: Material: resin and wax Shape: octagon Sizes: 10 mm Quantity: 650 pieces
Sealing Wax Melter Pot: Material: wooden and metal . Sizes: 3 inches in diameter, 1.5 inches in height
Wax Stamp: Material: brass stamp with wooden handle Stamp Sizes: 1 inch Length: 3 1/2 inches Pattern: tree of life
Envelopes: Material: paper Sizes: 8 3/4 inches by 4 1/4 inches Quantity: 10 pieces
Metallic Pen: Color: silver and gold Sizes: 5 1/2 inches Quantity: 2 pieces
Wax Melting Spoon: Size 4 1/2 inch
4 pieces of tea candles: Size 1 1/2 inch

item_name: Mouse Jiggler
desc:
USA/ Australia customers standard shipping is tracked.
We recommend you use the tracking option for international deliveries.

Our Mouse Jiggler is one of a kind. It stimulates the cursor on your screen to keep your computer active when you are away from your device. It is a stand-alone item that requires no software, no extra USB ports and no external power source. This enables you to have time away from the computer without showing up on any employee monitoring software.

If you would like to add tracking to the delivery **WE RECOMMEND THIS OPTION FOR NONE UK DELIVERY LOCATIONS** please select the correct delivery option.

Works with most optical mice (please see *further information below).


Compatible with any operating software and does not require Bluetooth. Simple and easy to use by placing your mouse on top of the device. Works by having a specific analogue watch inside the 3d printed case, which stimulates the mouse optics. The cursor on your screen will move around randomly and will prevent the screensaver from starting. Mouse not included. Patent pending.


*Further information; Please note that this is designed to work with most optical mice. It doesn‚Äôt work with the following; ‚ÄòLogitech M range invisible optic‚Äô mouse, ‚ÄòApple Magic 2‚Äô mouse, ‚ÄòMac‚Äô mouse or any laser mice. You should only need to spend a very short amount of time establishing how your mouse is best placed on top. If you are struggling, the Mouse Jiggler comes with some simple instructions and tips such as increasing your pointer/cursor speed or increasing your mouse sensitivity/DPI. Once you get the mouse in the correct position, this product works.

Uses:
Ideal if working from home!
Prevents the computer from timing out and stops the screensaver
The solution to a home office problem
Prevents you from being away on Microsoft Teams or Skype
Stops software shutting down and avoids time out issues
Stays active during gaming whilst AFK (away from keyboard)
Stops your computer shutting down overnight

Features: It has a specific analogue device inside the case which activates the mouse optics and in turn will move the cursor on your screen. Your actual mouse will not move or vibrate. It‚Äôs independently powered by a button cell battery that will last for at least 1 year.

Our money-back guarantee and customer reviews: All devices are tried and tested before dispatch and come with a 100% money-back guarantee. If you are not completely satisfied you can return it to us for a full refund. We have had lots of great reviews and feedback from our customers.

**mouse not included**

We are playing our part in keeping it green.
Our product is made from plant oil 100% recyclable.
Made in the UK
We aim to dispatch on the next working day.
Free first-class postage to the UK
Royal Mail International Standard (10-25 days) to the rest of the world for ¬£4.50 your product it may take up to 5 weeks to get delivered.
Royal Mail International Tracked aim (2-10 days)
Please allow extra time due to the pandemic and local delivery considerations.

A mouse jiggler is a motion simulator device for a computer mouse. It works by nudging the computer mouse cursor into action to prevent the computer screensaver from activating. Mouse jigglers are also known as mouse movers. Mechanical mouse jigglers are small devices onto which a user places their computer mouse. Wikipedia

People that love our Mouse Jiggler are the #quitequitting #quiet quitting. Just let the Mouse Jiggler work all day.

item_name: Gengar Pokemon, pokemon keycap, custom pokemon, custom keycap, artisan keycap, SA ESC keycap, mechanical keycaps | Gift for him
desc:
Gengar Pokemon, pokemon keycap, custom pokemon, custom keycap, artisan keycap, SA ESC keycap, mechanical keycaps | Gift for him

Breakwooden's custom artisan Pokemon keycaps are hunted all the time. With the highest level of detail and the most perfect colors and finishes, you will have a hard time believing your eyes when you receive the product.

Using the best paint color, covered under the high-grade anti-UV coating, the saturation of the keycaps will be perfectly protected for a long time.
To ensure the best gloss and transparency, we use the finest resin to keep your vision unobstructed when seeing the details inside the keycap.

A great gift for yourself or a meaningful gift for a loved one.
Gift for him, gift for her.

-- HOW IT'S MADE:
Confident as one of the biggest and most seriously invested keycap workshops in Vietnam, we possess the full equipment, people, skills and knowledge to produce the most professional custom keycap products.
Each product, when it reaches you, goes through 12 carefully controlled production steps:
Step 1: The product idea is sketched
Step 2: mold or design in 3D to make the first prototype. The prototype be considered and refine multiple times.
Step 3: The basic shape of the keycap is 3D printed
Step 4: The 3D printed model is washed with a special solution
Step 5: Illuminate the model under UV lamp
Step 6: Paint the base coat for the keycap
Step 7: Paint multiple layers of color, from large color patches to color details as small as 0.1mm
Step 8: Pour the resin
Step 9: The keycap mold is compressed in a high-pressure cage to remove air bubbles, creating absolute clarity
Step 10: Cut the excess details
Step 11: Go through 10-12 stages of extremely detail grinding and polishing to create a mirror-like shine
Step 12: Check each and every finishied keycap put into box
Each required step is performed by skilled artisans with a minimum of 3 to 5 years of experience.

-- SPECIFICATION:
- Material: High-clarity resin
- Depending on the position you wish to put the keycap in, the size would vary from 1U to 6.25U in which:
- 1U for single letter/Fx key
- 1.5U for Tab
- 1.75U for Caps Lock
- 2U for BackSpace
- 2.25U for Enter
- 2.75U for Shift
- 6U / 6,25U for Space

These are common standard size which may be different on your keyboard. Please refer to the keyboard manufacturer documentation for extract keycap layout

- Profile: OEM & SA
Not all size and profile are available to all item. Due to design's special details, some profiles is only available to some item. Please refer to our bundle option when you place the order.

Handmade 100%

-- PROCESSING TIME:
The processing time vary for each item. Usually it takes us about 3-4 days to finish the production, however sometime the finished item does not look really perfect and we may decide to make start over.
We just wish to deliver the best you can get.

-- CUSTOM KEYCAP ORDER:
As a real maker, we are capable of customize any keycap against your imagination. All you need to do is to describe the keycap you wished as detailed as possible. Our artisans will be working closely with you through the process and ensure the item will match your description.
As soon as we both side agree upon the design, we will make a custom order for you to purchase and we never fail to ship out the item after the processing time informed.

--BREAKWOODEN STORY:
We are a team of 20 disabled artisans from Vietnam. We nurtured our passion many years ago and worked hard to make our products as perfect as possible. We have a lot more time than everyone else and that has gradually become a great advantage. We have gathered as a team and want to make our name known to friends from all over the world. We hope it would be more meaningful for you to know the product you received is painted by a one-handed guy or polished by a guy who has been on his crutches for his whole life. All of that does not stop us from being good in what we do and your satisfaction will be our true pride.

"Breakwooden keeps it real!"

-- NOTE:
- For handmade products, please allow very slightly diference from what you see in photos. We dont do mass production so the mountains, rivers or smoke...can not be 100% the same everytime.

We ship our product world wide
Please provide your phone number so the logistic company could contact you when delivering the package if neccessary
You could see more of our item and passion at

Enjoy your shopping!

item_name: The Great Wave off Kanagawa of Wood Case ( For iPhone 14 Pro Max 13 Pro 11 12 Xs SE XR ,Samsung Galaxy S22 21 A73 A53, Google Pixel 6 7Pro )
desc:
About The Engraving.

The Great Wave off Kanagawa (Japanese: Á•ûÂ•àÂ∑ùÊ≤ñÊµ™Ë£è, Hepburn: Kanagawa-oki Nami Ura, lit. "Under the Wave off Kanagawa"), also known as The Great Wave or The Wave, is a woodblock print by the Japanese ukiyo-e artist Hokusai. It was created in 1831 in the late Edo period as the first print in Hokusai's series Thirty-six Views of Mount Fuji. The image depicts an enormous wave threatening three boats off the coast in the Sagami Bay (Kanagawa Prefecture) while Mount Fuji rises in the background. Sometimes assumed to be a tsunami, the wave is more likely to be a large rogue wave. This is a public domain work.



Order & Delivery.

‚ñ∂ Regular order: 1-2 days processing time (non-customized/personalized).

‚úé Custom/personalized order: 1-2 days processing time after proof confirmed.

‚úà ETA: 1-2 weeks to USA, UK & EU, Worldwide 8-25 days (Excluding remote cities such as The USA of Hawaii, Alaska, Puerto Rico, Maryland & APO/FPO/DPO addresses, they might take more than 25 days.)
Note: If Pick-up/Delivery notifications are available on your local couriers, you can put your phone number in the order note.

Key Features.

‚òë The surface is made of genuine wood and the bumper is made of soft TPU.

‚òë The engraving is burned into the wood with a high-power laser, without printing and coloring.

‚òë Compatible with regular wireless charging (QI), MagSafe (Magnetic) option available on some iPhone models

‚òë The front edges around the screen were raised a bit to protect the screen. (Note that on certain Samsung and Google models with a curved edge screen, this lip is reduced. I would suggest using a protective film.)

‚òë Note - Under natural light conditions, the actual color of Blackwood will be close to a brownish black. as this is a natural product, the grain and engraving may differ from the illustrations. But that is exactly what makes each case unique.

‚òë I offer a one-year warranty.


Customization:

‚ñ£ Add personalized texts to my designs:

You can add a personalized text engravings to all the designs in my store. To personalize your case. just leave a message with the text (quote/phrase / can be any language ) you want engraved when submitting your order or send me a message directly via ‚ÄúEtsy Messages‚Äù.

‚ñ£ Engrave your own designs or images
Step 1: Reach out to me via Etsy Messages. Send me the image you want to engrave (the file can be in any format), and specify your phone model. If your file can't be attached via Etsy Messages, please send it to my email address: guiji [!at] carveit.art

Step 2: I will create a rendering of the engraving (proof) for you and reply to your message within 24 hours after receiving your image (excluding weekends). Considering the hand drawing step, some complex graphics may take longer for me to process. After receiving my response, you can decide to continue with the order or provide suggestions for further changes (please note that each of your modification requests may take up to 24 hours to process). If the rendering(proof) doesn't meet your expectations, you can cancel the order or provide a new image with no additional cost.

Step 3: Note down my ‚ÄúProof and Layout number‚Äù , when submitting your order, you will need to include the "Proof and Layout number " or the word ‚ÄúCUSTOM‚Äù so that I know this is a custom item. ( please check the wood color and phone model in your order carefully ).
This is the listing for submitting custom orders. üîó


Note: Etsy has delivery time requirements, even for custom orders. If you submit an order before sending me the custom image, you need to confirm the information promptly after receiving my "engraving proof". If you do not confirm or request modifications within 48 hours, I will confirm the design and make the product for you based on my personal preferences. Thank you for your support and understanding.

Tips for the wood colors:
If we are engraving for effect rather than for personal color preference, Rosewood is often the most stable choice in my experience because it shows a higher contrast and makes the engraving appear more clear after engraving,. Cherry wood has a high contrast as well, but it has natural black wood grains and may have some spots. Walnut and Blackwood are darker in color, which means that the engraving will be closer to the color of the wood, making the design less marked and noticeable. ( This is the video to show you the wood color & laser-etched details. üîó )

I offer an additional option to make your engraving more visible.
Considering this is an etching process (the engraving is burned into the wood with a high-power laser ), It is pure engraving without printing and coloring. The visibility of engraving entirely depends on the wood colors (wood species); It will be more visible on Rosewood and Cherry wood, while Blackwood and walnuts are secondary. But there another option I provided is I can make your engraving more visible(more black) by using "Black ink (or Acrylic Paint) " This is a free additional service, and I will not do it until you ask since not everybody accepts using ink/pigment on engraving. ( I posted a video to show you my laser engraving and inking service. üîó )
üìù #To use this additional service. you can leave "Stained Black" in your order note.

#If you can't open my video URLs on Etsy App, Copy it to your Chrome or Safari.
#Copyright Notice: these trade names (Apple iPhone*/MagSafe*/Samsung Galaxy*/Google Pixel*/Chrome*/Safari*) are protected by the registered trademarks of their respective owners.).

item_name: Mini Smoke Machine (Costronica type1)
desc:
Mini smoke machine for a wide range of cosplay , costume , tabletop , photography and many other projects !

The perfect accessory to go with whatever you are creating, but make it come alive with smoke and possibly light.

Read on to see whats included with EVERY order!

- Complete with switch of your choice.
- Quick connect push fitting on top (to easy connect/disconnect tube)
- Built in controller to set amount of effect generated.
- 1 meter of tube to guide effect to a point of your choosing.
- 1 5ml bottle filled with juice, save and refill for easy refilling of unit.
- Connector for our Costronica Bright LED Addon. (check out our seperate listing for "Costronica SmokeBright LED Add-on" )
- Instructional video, available after purchase send directly to you.

Costronica Smoke can run for 20 minutes straight before a refill is needed, however recommended use is intermittent with a cooling off period in between to prolong coil life and allow juice to soak up into cotton and reach the coils.
Costronica Smoke is powered by 3 types of battery options listed above.

Check the last image listed for a dimensional overview.

To refill Costronica type 1 use PropyleenGlycol (PG) or use Glycerine (VG) Glycerine is more viscous than PG, but does provide thicker smoke, a mix of the 2 is also possible, the small sample bottle has a 70% PG to 30% VG in it

We offer 3 types of switches:

Momentary switch wired 1 meter (3.28 ft): this is perfect for triggers or intermediate bursts where you want full control. (see pictures for example)
Toggle switch wired 1 meter (3.28 ft): switch on and will stay on untill you switch unit off. perfect for running the smoke machine while you pose for epic pictures doing your best battle stance and cosplay acts (see pictures for example)
Remote control: 2 buttons on remote, 1 programmed for momentary, the other programmed for toggle, best of both worlds.

information on the battery options:

- 18650 battery case, will power the smoker for a long time with or without led, charger available in a seperate listing.
- 4x AA alkaline battery, the common AA battery, safe option and can run it with led as well , AA batteries are available anywhere so you can always bring or acquire spares.
- 9v battery (alkaline), the smallest option if space is very limited, can run smoker but battery goes fast, with (ONE) led combined it will drain extremely fast so bring spares if this is your only choice.

desc:
Item- Indian Vintage Handmade Patchwork Quilt.



How do we make these patchwork quilts - As these are handmade quilts, it takes a long time to make a quilt. First we are collecting the vintage fabric to make these patchwork quilts. After gathering the fabric, we cut it into small-small patches and sewed them together. Once this process is completed, we keep the front fabric and the back fabric and stitch them by hand. We work hard throughout day and night to make these handmade beautiful vintage patchwork quilts.

Material- Cotton fabric, Silky Fabric


Front Side Material - Silky Fabric


Back Side Material- Pure Cotton fabric



*Floral Patchwork pattern on the front side.

* Backing with solid pattern.

* Colored threads are used to develop the Kantha pattern.



Quilts Size:-

Baby Size - 60" x 40" Inches (152 x 101.6 CM )


Twin Quilt - 90" x 60 Inches ( 228 x 152 CM )


Queen Quilt Size- 108"x 90" Inches ( 274"x 228" CM )

Custom Size - 120" x 108" Inches ( 304" x 274" CM )


Custom Size - 120" x 120" Inches ( 304" x 304" CM )



Pillow Size :-

2 Standard Pillows - 20" x 28" Inches ( 50.8" x 71.10" CM )


2 king Pillows - 20" x 36" Inches ( 50.8" x 91.4" CM )



Note: - As this is Applique Hand patchwork, there will be variation in patches Every Piece Comes Different But Base Color/Theme will Be same. (The listing pictures are only for samples)


Note - loose threads to be expected (Just because it is pure handmade product)


Note - The entire Two Layer of Silk and Cotton quilt is hand embroidered with end number of straight stitches to create a unique product, one of a kind that it‚Äôs a perfect GIFT too. , All these make them a Patchwork Quilt.

Note - When women make these quilts, they are not able to keep a long thread in their hands at one go. That's why after that thread is finished, she takes a new thread and stitches that quilt from there. So in some of the places, the open threads are expected as these are totally handmade.


Note - There is no batting between two layers. These are thin quilts. Perfect for all season.


Washing Care - Light hand wash in cool water or Dry clean only

item_name: Fluff Ewes "Rain(bow) or Shine" 100% Premium Wool Dryer Balls, 6-pack, Natural Fabric Softener, Eco-Friendly
desc:
Ditch the Disposable Dryer Sheets for our adorable Fluff Ewes Rain(bow) or Shine Dryer Balls! These effective babes will surely cheer up your loads, too.

- Natural fabric softener; reduces wrinkles and static

- Chemical free, no fillers or synthetic ingredients‚Äîa rubber-free, petroleum-free alternative to tennis balls and plastic dryer steamer balls

- Decrease drying time by 20-40% (depending on load size)

- Conserve energy (and save money on your utility bill!)

- Eco-friendly; eliminates waste in landfills with this reusable alternative to disposable dryer sheets (reusable dryer balls last for 1,000+ laundry loads, or 2-4 years)

- 100% Premium New Zealand Wool

SET INCLUDES: 6 Extra Large Dryer Balls

USAGE: Throw all 3-6 dryer balls into your laundry load depending on load size.

TIPS: For clothes that smell heavenly, add a few drops of your favorite pure essential oil to your Fluff Ewe dryer ball before tossing it in the dryer.

For combating extra stubborn static, add a tablespoon of white vinegar to a dryer ball or a piece of cloth and toss into your dryer with the remaining Fluff Ewes.

About our Wool:
Our Fluff Ewes dryer balls are made from some of the finest wool in the world, sourced sustainably from happy New Zealand sheep. These sheep graze in outdoor pastures year round, cared for by skillful farmers who use pain-and-cruelty-free shearing practices that keep the sheep healthy and comfortable. New Zealand also prohibits exporting sheep out of the country, so these cuties get to hang out in their home pastures their entire lives, donating their excess wool for us to enjoy. Thanks, guys!

desc:

Problem: >>> Regular magnifiers and cheap readers can be difficult to see through because of the blurry low quality optics with too strong or too weak magnification. Besides most of them are bulky and not hands free.

Solution: >>> Vision Aid Magnifier will help you see the smallest details up to 350% Larger, giving you a Crystal Clear View of tiny objects and keeping your Hands Free to let you Work More Productively.


5 MAGNIFICATION STRENGTHS FOR DIFFERENT PROJECTS

- 1x, 1.5x, 2x, 2.5x, 3.5x magnification ideal for people with low vision and who need vision aide for close up work.

- Ideal magnification for needlework, painting, jewelry making, beadwork, reading, macular degeneration, crafting.

*What does 1x magnification mean? - A 1x magnification power is a 100 percent increase in the magnified object's size For example, a 1-inch object at 1x would appear to be 2 inches.


ILLUMINATE YOUR WORK HANDS-FREE

- The built-in bright LED headlight illuminates exactly where your eyes are looking and helps you get a clearer and brighter view of tiny details in dark places.

- No more disturbing the person next to you when reading in bed. Targeted soft light comes in handy in dark places too where using a regular lamp may not be convenient.

- The LED Light lasts for about 6-8 hours if you use it non-stop. Recharges fully within 30 minutes. USB charging cord is included in the set.


FITS OVER PRESCRIPTION GLASSES

- Instead of buying different prescription glasses just wear the Vision Aid Magnifier on top of your favorite eyeglasses to achieve extra magnification. Use the 1X magnification power to see even more up-close while maintaining a healthy posture.


LIGHTER THAN YOU THINK

- Vision Aid magnifier weighs only 3 oz which makes it lightweight and allows you to wear it for an extended period of time even on top of your regular eyeglasses. Just use the headband instead of regular arms to make it even more comfortable!

Do You Have Higher Magnification Lenses? - No we don't and we would not recommend as higher magnification means you will have to hold the object very close to your face which will make any magnifier difficult to use. The 1x-3.5x magnification is ideal for people with low vision.

item_name: Herb Stripper and Spice Leaf Stripper. Pure Copper. Handmade in USA. Perfect Gift for Cooks & Chefs. Ultimate Kitchen Utensil.
desc:
Pure hand hammered copper herb leaf stripper. Seven different size holes fit most herb and spice stems allowing you to easy remove the leaves for cooking, salads, and garnishes. The curved shape forms a bowl to collect the leaves. I design my herb stripper so it looks like a leaf and the beautiful copper color will bring beauty and good energy to every kitchen. The leaf shape of each is unique as I use reclaimed copper sheets of odd sizes and shapes. Some end up looking like a birch leaf and others like a elm. Then again it might look like a lime or plum leaf. The copper tell me the shape it wishes to be.

Each one is made to order. The size is about 5.5" x 3". The holes range in size. The large hole will strip leaves from large plants such as Kale and the small hole works perfect with rosemary and thyme. The holes in-between lets you quickly prepare almost any herb or spice. The hole sizes are 1/16", 1/8", 3/16", 1/4" 5/16" 3/8" & 7/16". Sometimes I get copper sheets that are not standard size and I end up with extra copper when I'm done cutting them out. When this happens, I will make them larger so I don't waste the copper. So, if you leaf stripper comes bigger, it's your lucky day.

Copper is unique in its anti-bactrical properties. With in two hours 99.9% of the germs on copper are dead, including E.coli and salmonella and listeria. Copper also conducts, transfers and focus energy. It was the first metal man learned to form thousands of years ago. Many believe that using copper to cook with removes harmful EMF radiation from our food improving health benefits.

I only use pure repurposed / recycled solid copper sheets to create with. The copper for the leaf stripper is thick gauge copper. I hand hammer each piece using my grandfathers hammers. I send this to you without any chemical treatment or modern finishing so the natural patina of copper can develop it rich beautiful color. Each piece is unique. The recycle copper I use comes with its own signature of marks and scratches. I remove most of them but leave a few to retain its original identity.

Copper is the traditional gift for a 7th wedding anniversary. Copper will last lifetimes. You will enjoy this for years to come and will pass it on for generation.

I make everything by hand, using 100 year old tools passed down to me and techniques from old. I form copper in my little work shop on top of a hill bending and hammering on an old tree stump.

I am happy to take custom orders. I can craft bowls, boxes, knife, spoons and other kitchen instruments.

I look forward to making something special and beautiful for you. Click to order now.

E.P. Thompson
Copper Smith
