item_name: Adjustable ergonomic under desk foot rest office gifts
desc: In our workshop, we carry out R&D studies on "Applied Ergonomics" with our field experience in Ergonomics and Occupational Health and Safety for nearly twenty years. In our design and production processes, we consider that our products are unique, effective, efficient and create a sense of satisfaction in the user. In office workers, the blood flow in their legs is forced due to constant sitting and folding of the legs. This is the main reason for swelling and fatigue in the feet at the end of the work. We were inspired by our mothers' sewing machines in the design of our patented product. Moving the feet back and forth from time to time during the day relaxes the blood circulation. In addition to this, our product has become the first example in the world with its soft puff support that increases relaxation by lengthening the legs. It has become final with the feedback we received from about fifty users. There are special anti-slip rubbers and special sponges and silicone covers that prevent the noise that may occur with movement. It can be used easily in open offices. You can watch the video of the first version of our product, how an under-desk leg support can positively affect the health of office workers. The product is sent disassembled.

item_name: Tabletop Glass Fireplace, Gifts for him! 2 sizes: Warm up your patio & heart with this lantern, add some light, and even roast S'mores, too!
desc:
>>UPDATE: Our Tabletop Fireplace design has been adapted to a much thicker wood. This will hold up even better in outdoor conditions. There is a richer grain pattern in this wood, which is different from what is pictured. The structure and cuteness remain the same! Updated photos to follow soon!

DESCRIPTION:
Looking for something unique to brighten up your outdoor entertaining space? Maybe you want to warm up your perfect indoor space, as well. Add a mini-fireplace to your next gathering to enjoy the dancing flame for hours.

With gel fuel, this lantern lights instantly and can be controlled easily for safety. The glass adds interest with reflections, but can also be removed quickly for making dessert, like S'mores! When you're done, just refill the gel for next time.

This kit is made up of a few parts: The base is a natural birch, it's wood that can be stained or painted. If you plan on leaving it outdoors, a finish should be applied. 4 pieces of glass make up the top. The base comes as 11 pieces that snap together easily without glue or special hardware in minutes.

The actual flame is a nice steady glow, mostly blue with a few orange highlights. The nature of night photography enhances the flame seen in the photo to appear larger. Other fuels may produce different results (See disclaimer above.)

*Second photo is an actual customer using our Fireplace in their home.. I couldn't be more proud to show it!

WHAT TO EXPECT:
‚Ä¢ All 3 kits ship flat-packed, unassembled, and ready to get your inner child excited.
‚Ä¢ After unpacking and following the Quick Start guide that comes with it, or the full detailed assembly instructions found on our website (onemanonegarage.com) you will put your new creation to the test. Turn it on, dim the lights, and be mesmerized!
‚Ä¢ If you are giving this as a gift we strongly recommend you let the recipient enjoy the assembling process. They will love you for the experience you're giving them!
‚Ä¢ Only the Basic and Deluxe are suitable for use with Sterno Gel Fuel. The Mini uses a candle only.

MEARUREMENTS:
‚Ä¢ 2 sizes when assembled:
‚Ä¢ Mini 3"x3"x4" tall
‚Ä¢ Basic 6"x6"x9" tall
‚Ä¢ Deluxe 6"x6"x9" tall

WHAT'S IN THE BOX:
‚Ä¢ MINI: Box set includes 4 bevel glass panes, all the wooden parts for the Base, a Quick start Guide and Tea Light Candle.
‚Ä¢ BASIC: Box set includes 4 flat glass panes, all the wooden parts for the Base, and a Quick start Guide. (*You supply a safe amount of Sand and Decorative Stones, or Glass pebbles, plus Gel Fuel or candle, not included)
‚Ä¢ DELUXE: Box set includes 4 flat glass panes, all the wooden parts for the Base, roasting sticks, Lava Stones and Heat Resistant Sand necessary for use, and a Quick start Guide.
‚Ä¢ DELUXE: Box set includes 4 Beveled glass panes, all the wooden parts for the Base, roasting sticks, Lava Stones and Heat Resistant Sand necessary for use, and a Quick start Guide.
(*Gel Fuel or candle, not included)


WARNING:
‚Ä¢ Be cautious, especially with children around. This item has some pointy parts.
‚Ä¢ Glass can be fragile. Take caution with intense heat. Avoid direct contact with the flame, specially in breezy situations.
‚Ä¢ Heat Resistant Sand: Either supply your own or opt for the Deluxe kit to include it. Lay down a bed of sand to rest the 2.6oz can of Gel Fuel (Sterno) can. Sand protects the wood base from the direct heat.
‚Ä¢ Never leave an open flame unattended, either Indoors or Out. Under unsure conditions, consider working with a Candle or LED light.

Not sure how you assemble it? Find the complete build instructions on our website:
https://onemanonegarage.com/pages/support
You'll find all our PDF files to view and download

*DUE TO SHIPPING REGULATIONS, FUEL CAN NOT BE INCLUDED AS PART OF THE KIT. A 2.6oz can of Sterno is fairly inexpensive, easy to find, and can be refilled cheaply as well. (Order from Amazon for quick delivery if you prefer. A 3pk is about $6) According to Sterno, their 2.6oz can burns for up to 45min.

*Designs may vary slightly from the photos, as improvements get worked into the new versions!

item_name: Kingfisher Bird Hard Enamel Pin with Wooden Gift Box and Deluxe Locking Clutch - Premium Lapel Pin Gift Inspired by Nature (1.5 Inches)
desc:
Our first pin!

Featuring a kingfisher from our game Ecologies: Bizarre Biomes, we wanted to make a pin beautiful enough to be used as jewelry.

The pin measures 1.5 inches at its longest point and features 7 different shades of hard enamel. The kingfisher hovers mid-flight, holding a small fish in its beak.

The pin features a deluxe locking clutch, the most secure option available for pins you truly love. Butterfly clutches loosen over time, and rubber, silicone, and magnetic backings sometimes come off, losing the pin in the process. Locking clutches feature a unique design where you simultaneously pull the flat top while pushing the body of the clutch to lock and unlock the pin in place. Never loose a pin again!

We also include a premium wooden gift box with each pin, and a section of burlap as pin backing to prevent movement during transport.

We hope you love it as much as we do!

item_name: Personalized Photo Engraved Keychain ‚Ä¢ Custom Pet Gifts ‚Ä¢ Pet Memorial ‚Ä¢ Dog Keychain ‚Ä¢ Pet Keychain ‚Ä¢ Gifts For Pets ‚Ä¢ Custom keychain
desc:
‚ô• Customize this handmade keychain with a picture of your special animal or person, make it special for anyone! This makes a wonderful gift for any occasion. ‚ô•

Get 50% Off Today: LIMITED Quantity Available!

Material: 925 Sterling Silver (Recommend), Stainless Steel, Gold, Rose Gold


H O W ‚àô T O ‚àô O R D E R

1) Choose material - Stainless Steel, 925 Sterling Silver, Gold, Rose gold

2) Pick a photo from your camera roll or social media

3) Send us your image and include your personalization - Simply use the -ASK A QUESTION or -CONTACT SHOP OWNER button to send the image before or after purchasing. (all orders include free engraving on the back)


DESIGN PROCESS

Our talented team will analyze your image to get prepared for the engraving process by drawing a perfect resemblance of your photo.

WORKMANSHIP

Your Custom Pet Gift is finely crafted, engraved and packaged in a cute gift box with a bow. You'll have a forever memory of furbaby!


P H O T O ‚àô G U I D E L I N E S

‚àô PLEASE DON'T USE BLURRY PHOTOS - The image you upload is most important. A higher quality image will result in a higher quality design. A smartphone will do the trick.

‚àô GOOD LIGHTING IS KEY - Good outside lighting is ideal. If taken inside we ask preferably for light to be shining on the pet.

‚àô MORE THAN ONE PET - We suggest using 1 pet per pendant but if you want to do two pets please take an image of them side by side with little space between them. Using more than one pet will not increase the size of the pendant either.

‚àô PLACEMENT IS IMPORTANT - If you include the whole body of your pet, we will engrave the full body. If you only upload an image of the pet head we will only engrave the pet's head.


O T H E R ‚àô I N F O R M A T I O N

‚Ä¢ All items are nicely packaged ready to gift in elegant jewelry boxes with bows.

‚Ä¢ If you can't find the information you need or need some advice for your design? Feel free to contact us. We are fast to reply :)

‚Ä¢ All items are custom made to order. Our turn around time is about 7-10 business days for processing followed by 3-5 days for shipping via USPS First-Class Mail. This can change during peak seasons. Please check our home page for the most current times.


‚Ä¢ All images are copyrighted by Custom Pet Gifts. All rights reserved ‚Ä¢


F A Q

Q Can you do any animal? I have guinea pigs.

A Yes we can, as long as you have it's photo.



Q Pets photo only? or can I do a human photo with someones head?

A We can do animals and people.



Q How long does shipping take to USA?

A Shipping takes 3-5 business days via USPS First-Class Mail with tracking available. We ship from Austin, Texas!



Q Hi. Can these be used on a charm bracelet instead of keychain?

A Yes, we can do it if customer has such request.



Q What about two pets in a photo? My mom has this adorable photo of her cat laying next to her dog (now deceased). It would make a lovely birthday present.

A Yes we can do it.



Q Can you make four dogs in one keychain?

A We can do it, Please kindly note that the pendant is only about 2.5cm. If 4 dogs group together in one pendant, they will look very very small. We don't suggest customers to do in this way.

desc:

view my wedsite

www.stuartwiltshireglass.co.uk

Any other request or if any help needed please email me ‚¨áÔ∏è

info [!at] stuartwiltshireglass.co.uk


Cremation Ashes Glass Wave with your pets Ashes set inside.
Every piece is Handmade at 1120c using premium quality Barium crystal glass.
We will need 1 table spoon of ashes so I can use a small amount and return any leftover.
I will gather the molten glass at 1120c and add your chosen colour, then I will add your cremation ashes and mix them together in my glory hole at temperatures of around 1220c, after shaping and forming the random 3D patterns, so no 2 are the same, I will gather anotherii layer of molten glass over the colour and ashes, incasing the Cremation ashes inside. Now I can shape, reheat and sculpt the molten glass into a yea light holder, handmade Cat, paperweight or sculpture.

Please send 1 table spoon of ashes in a sealed bag, with your name number and email attached to and a note. You can change colours ect by email after you have paid and sent your ashes. I may even call you when I make your item if I need to double check anything.

Red Cornelian brings self-confidence built on fearlessness. It reflects the color of passion, energy, and life. It motivates. It is a very strong color ‚Äì the color of fire and blood. [Metal Hardware] The metal connectors are Stainless Steel, and are available in Silver, Black, Gold, and Rose Gold colors. The metal beads are both lead and cadmium free. Stainless steel is resistance to ferric oxide formation which results from the presence of chromium in the alloy, and contains a passive film coating that protects the underlying material from corrosion attack, and can heal itself in the presence of oxygen.

item_name: Wax Seal Stamp Kit - Wax Seal Kit 650pcs Wax Seal Beads, Sealing Wax Warmer, Envelopes, Wax Stamp, Wax Seal Spoon, Candles, Tweezers and Pen
desc:
A Variety Of Wax Seal Sets to Choose From. Please select the wax set based on the name mentioned in the images.

Trustela's Wax Seal Stamp Kit - Wax Seal Kit with 650pcs Wax Seal Beads, Sealing Wax Warmer, Envelopes, Wax Stamp, Wax Seal Spoon, Tea light Candles, Tweezers and Metallic Pen for Gifts, Letters, Crafts and Decoration Sealing


WAX STAMP KIT Trustela's wax seal stamp kit comes with 650 pieces of sealing wax beads in a variety of colors, wax seal warmer, tree of life wax seal stamp, sealing wax melting spoon, 4 tealight candles, 10 envelopes, 2 metallic pens and Tweezers.


WAX STAMP SEAL KIT contains good quality wax seal beads that are smokeless, odorless, non-toxic and melt easily that provide a perfect seal every time. Sealing Wax Kit has letter wax beads are in a variety of different colors including gold, red, rose, pink, turquoise, purple etc. Wax letter seal kit provides you a good selection of colors to meet all your wax stamp seals needs.


Wax Letter Seal Kit is an ALL In One wax seal stamp set. It comes with a wax stamp furnace that helps place the wax seal warmer melting spoon on the stove and allows the tea light candle lit at all times. Tweezers allow you to place seal wax beads without burning your hands. High quality brass letter wax seal stamp gives a sharp and crisp stamp each time which can be enhanced by using metallic pens.


LETTER SEALING WAX KIT is convenient to use with octagon shaped wick less beads. 3-4 wax beads will be enough to get a perfect seal for gifts, envelope, wedding invitations, bottle, graduation letters, Christmas gifts, maps, retro letters, manuscripts, parcels, cards, crafts, wine sealing, party invitations etc.


100% SATISFACTORY If you have any questions about the wax sealing kit then please feel free to contact us. We will do our best to solve it for you.


Trustela's Wax Stamp Set comes with 650 pieces of sealing wax beads in a variety of colors, wax seal warmer, tree of life wax seal stamp, sealing wax melting spoon, 4 tealight candles, 10 envelopes, 2 metallic pens and Tweezers.

How To Use Wax Seal Set:
1. Light the wick of the tea light candle and cover with the wax seal warmer.
2 . Put the spoon on the wax seal warmer and put 3-4 wax sealing beads into the spoon to melt.
3. Wait for the sealing wax to melt into liquid. Then pour the melted wax into a perfect circle in order to cover the whole stamp.
4. Let the wax cool down for around 15 sec and press the stamp on the wax.
5. Remove the wax stamp and always remember to blow out the candles after use for safety.
6. You can use the metallic pen to decorate the pattern of the stamp to make it more beautiful.

Sealing Wax: Material: resin and wax Shape: octagon Sizes: 10 mm Quantity: 650 pieces
Sealing Wax Melter Pot: Material: wooden and metal . Sizes: 3 inches in diameter, 1.5 inches in height
Wax Stamp: Material: brass stamp with wooden handle Stamp Sizes: 1 inch Length: 3 1/2 inches Pattern: tree of life
Envelopes: Material: paper Sizes: 8 3/4 inches by 4 1/4 inches Quantity: 10 pieces
Metallic Pen: Color: silver and gold Sizes: 5 1/2 inches Quantity: 2 pieces
Wax Melting Spoon: Size 4 1/2 inch
4 pieces of tea candles: Size 1 1/2 inch
Tweezers: Size: 4 3/4 inch

item_name: ADHD Digital Planner (made by an ADHDer) for iPad, Goodnotes + Android. Adult ADD daily planner, self care & habit tracker. Science based
desc:
ADHD DIGITAL PLANNER FOR GOODNOTES, NOTABILITY AND OTHER PDF ANNOTATION APPS.

üåë DARK MODE (the most requested color by far!)

This digital ADHD planner is NOT just another digital planner with 'ADHD' slapped on the title. It's a framework designed by an ADHD brain (mine!) especially for you and your neurodivergent brain.

I thought I was terrible at planning until I realized that most planners aren‚Äôt designed for my brain. They‚Äôre designed for neurotypical brains. So I made this planner with one key goal in mind: MAKE A PLANNER THAT SOMEONE WITH ADHD CAN ACTUALLY STICK TO.

Naturally, I did what every ADHDer does... dived down a massive rabbit hole of research! Then I got to work creating a planner based on the latest neuroscience and behavioral psychology. In every section of this adult ADHD planner, you can read the scientific reasoning, research and how our templates directly support and empower your creative, fast-brained ADHD mind.


ñ§ê COMPATIBILITY ñ§ê

Apps I recommend:

- iOS: Goodnotes, Notability, Noteful
- Android: Flexcil, Noteshelf

- Best experience with stylus or Apple Pencil
- If you are not sure, check your app has read-only and annotation functions
- We recommend GoodNotes 5 as the best free option
- Not compatible with OneNote or Kindle Fire

(üë©‚Äçüíª Not techy? No probs! If you have never used a digital planner before, ME TOO! Until recently, when I made this digital planner, and now I'm hooked. It's literally the best thing everrr! I made a Setup Wizard to walk you through importing to your device, plus a Quick Start Guide inside the planner!)


‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

UNIQUE TEMPLATES FOR YOUR ADHD BRAIN ‚§µÔ∏è

I came up with unique templates to UN-FREEZE our analysis paralysis and doom spirals, and move into healthier habits that create *real results* and help us achieve our biggest goals. ‚úî

This ADHD digital planner is different to the other planners you‚Äôll find on the internet. It's a shame-free, customizable layout that allows you add pages each day as needed, instead of staring at a bunch of pages you haven't used and feeling guilty. It includes unique visual tools I invented based on research... like the Hyperfocus Lotus, Div/Con planning and Symmetry Stress-relief. These methods sound weird, but they actually work!


üî¨ WHAT IS THE SCIENTIFIC BASIS? üî¨
There is so much to explore when you begin researching ADHD science, but I have focused on the research that relates most pressingly to productivity and routine. The templates and the supporting information inside are based on the work of several significant contributors to ADHD research‚Ä¶ Dr Russell Barkley, particularly his comments on the nature of attentional differentiation being linked to shifts in interest and motivation; Dr Edward Hallowell & Dr John Ratey, and particularly their work on negative self perception links to self-efficacy, and overabundance (not limitation) of attention; and Tamara Rosier and her work on divergent and convergent thinking habits in ADHD brains and 'light switch' emotional responses to tasks which influences our executive functioning ability. The planner includes 6 pages where I cover this research and link it to areas like ADHD & time perception, Divergent & Convergent thinking, ADHD & motivation, Why ADHD Minds Wander, ADHD & exercise and ADHD Hyperfocus.


-‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

I get it. Habits and goals feel weird and hard. My planner includes guided tips and suggestions the whole way through - and this section is no exception‚Ä¶ filled with practical breakdowns and actionable steps, based on the latest behavioural science. ‚úîÔ∏è

ñ§ê Unique Focus Tools ñ§ê

** Unique visual tools I invented (based on the neuroscience) to specifically help ADHD brains:

ñ§ê Unwind Un-mind ñ§ê

‚åÇ ‚ÄòColor to Calm‚Äô pages (to pull your ADHD brain out of divergent ‚Äòpinging thoughts‚Äô mode and move into logical convergent thinking)

‚ú® BONUS 2: Printable ‚ÄòColor to Calm‚Äô and 'Symmetry Stress-relief' handy carry cards (so you can take them with you when you don't have your iPad üòâ)


Once you‚Äôve turned down the volume on the static inside your mind, you can get busy and kick some big goals. Because, of all the ADHD traits, is there anything as tiring as the constant static in the brain? The whir and buzz of a million thoughts zinging around like popcorn... üçø

Help your brain. Get your digital ADHD planner today and start planning your successful, balanced life.


‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

DIGITAL PLANNER DESIGN FOR YOUR ADHD BRAIN ‚§µÔ∏è

For the past 10 years I've been a graphic designer, copywriter and UX/UI website designer. When I looked at the digital planners for iPads on Etsy, I found my ADHD brain excited at first, then overwhelmed. There were SO many links and buttons in the documents (across the top and down the sides) that I gave up after only a few days.

So I approached designing a digital planner with hyperlinked pages like I design websites... The navigation must be intuitive and simple. So I've designed this whole planner around two central menus, with home and back buttons on each page. Functionally, you can get to any template in 2-3 taps. And that simplicity helps us ADHDers stick with it! üí™üèº
‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

WHAT MAKES THIS PLANNER ADHD FRIENDLY? ‚§µÔ∏è

This digital planner has many typical features, like daily planning spreads, habit trackers, meal planning and checklists, but features significant differences.

Our ADHD brains start off energetically, but quickly get so overwhelmed by the sheer number of options in regular planners that we‚Äôll give up two days in.

Our brains need something different, so I tested and refined these templates so you have the absolute best tools, and the highest chance of consistency.

The bottom line? Every single page and template inside this planner has been carefully and intentionally created to scaffold, support and guide you to a place of more mental clarity, and less chaos and white noise. Even the central menu design is simplified compared to other digital planners - we need less clutter and distraction.

Sound amazing? It is. Get the ultimate tool to help you succeed!

item_name: Christmas Friendly Feud Game | Printable Christmas Game | Christmas Party Game | Christmas Game Adults Family | Christmas Trivia |
desc:
Gather your family and friends and play this hilarious game of Christmas Family Feud! It's sure to bring smiles to everyone's faces at your next Christmas gathering!

This game is played with 2 opposing teams and a Host. The goal is to guess the most common answers to the survey questions - all centered around Christmas. 100 people were surveyed and their answers are compiled for each question.

Try to come up with all of the answers before you get 3 Strikes!

This printable game features 25 different Survey Questions. 2 Questions print per page.

To make the game easier to play, there are Host Cards and Contestant Cards for each question. The Host card is what the host uses to see the correct answers. The Contestant Card is what is shown to the players during the game. It shows how many answers they will need to guess for each Survey Question. Additional rules are included on a 2 Page Instruction sheet.

**Once you purchase, you will receive a link to the digital file (PDF) in US Letter size. It will be 3 files, including:
- 13 Pages of Contestant Cards (without Survey Answers)
- 13 Pages of Host Cards (with Survey Answers)
- 9 Pages of "All Other Items" - Includes Instructions, Scoreboard and Strike Cards

item_name: BUY 2 GET 1 FREE Mosaic Plant! (Ludwigia Sedioides)-Easy Live Aquarium Pond Aquatic Plant
desc:
This listing: 1 Mosaic Plant (Ludwigia Sedioides) Bundle, multiple stems

Description: The mosaic plant is truly one-of-a-kind; the leaves of the plant radiate from the center stem like tiles laid in a mandala. The leaves are diamond-shaped and dark to light green, with jagged red edges. This incredibly unique plant has a stem that is rooted in the substrate, but its leaves float on the surface of the water. Though this plant is more commonly found cultivated in ponds it can be a stunning addition to an aquarium. If lighting is set to simulate day/night cycle, these plants will close up during dark hours and unfurl to their full width in the light. Brighter light yields redder coloring in these plants.

Size Ranges: 6+ inches

Care Sheet for Mosaic Plant (Ludwigia Sedioides):
‚Ä¢ Care: easy
‚Ä¢ Co2: not required
‚Ä¢ Growth rate: med
‚Ä¢ Placement: floating, rooted with florets at water surface
‚Ä¢ Lighting requirements: mid-high
‚Ä¢ Color: Red-Green
‚Ä¢ Max size: 12"+

A 1:20 ratio bleach to water dip is generally recommended for most plants; so if you want to be sure your plant is 100% sterilized against unwanted pests or algae, please perform a bleach dip, and definitely always wash and rinse plants before introducing them to any new environment. item_name: Peruvian handmade Alpaca luxury doggy poncho. Size X0-6. Beautiful and a definite must have. | Dog sweater | luxury dog clothes |Free Ship
desc:
Doggies get cold too! Especially the smaller bread. I know our Yorkie, Luna, loves her Alpaca Poncho and it looks so cute too! If you love buying unique luxury clothing for your doggy then this is for you! These are handmade with fine Alpaca wool. Perfect for the Fall and Winter, it will keep your doggy warmer and more comfortable.

Why Alpaca? Well, Alpaca hair is hollow, just like our hair. The reason this is important is that it has a unique ability to regulate heat. This is perfect for our dogs! Unlike other wools that keep heating you up continuously, Alpaca will stop heating you up when you are warm and when your body temperature drops it triggers the Alpaca to start warming you up. This poncho will not only keep your doggy comfortable and warm but also get you many compliments.

As with all our doggy clothes, this poncho is very easy to put on. The beautiful Alpaca is a comfortable loose-knit around the collar so it is easy to slip over your doggie's head. The poncho drapes nicely on your doggies back and there is a strap to tie under the chest to hold it comfortably in place.

This is truly a luxury doggy poncho that is perfect for the person that loves only the finest clothes for their doggy.

PROMOTES YOUR DOGS ORAL HEALTH: Tibetan Dog Chews help in removing plaque and tartar buildup when your dog gnaws on them. It helps to clean teeth, freshen the breath and promote their oral health.
100% NATURAL, LIMITED INGREDIENTS: Tibetan Dog Chews, a 100% natural cheese chews are made in the foothills of Mount Everest and other hilly regions of Nepal by the artisan farmers using the centuries old authentic recipe that has only 4 limited ingredients, Yak milk, Cow milk, Salt and Lime juice.
NO PRESERVATIVES: Tibetan Dog Chews do not contain any kind of preservatives or additives and is naturally chemical free, grain free, gluten free and safe for most dogs with lactose intolerance and sensitive stomachs.
KEEPS YOUR DOG BUSY: Tibetan Dog Chews are very hard and long lasting chews as compared to other similar products. An average chewer takes several hours if not days to fully devour it. Be sure to give the right sized chew for the right sized dog, then sit back, relax and see them enjoy! It keeps your dog busy and provides hours and hours of healthy enjoyment.
OUR PROMISE: We are dedicated in bringing you natural alternatives for the health and well being of your dogs. Tibetan Dog Chews are High Protein, Long Lasting, Minimal Odor, Non Staining, No Preservatives, No Binding Agents, No Artificial Colors or Flavors, No Grains, No Gluten, a 100% Natural and close to being a "Certified Organic" product. Tibetan Dog Chew is a treat and is not intended to be fed as a meal. When treats are given, amount of food should be reduced accordingly. desc:

*Pictures are past shoes used as examples, colors/prints may not be available, however we maintain a vast and extensive selection of prints and wool. If you have a specific color or theme you'd like, please put it in the "notes to seller" when you check out.

The example photos are all past shoes and not available anymore however we have an ever changing stock of wool and cotton prints available! You can give your preferences in the notes when you check out.

Perfect for both walkers and crawlers, these shoes stay put no matter how your baby moves! The soles provide traction helping to keep new walkers on their toes! Shoes are fully lined with super soft fleece, fits with or without socks. Fully encased ankle elastic will keep shoes on the most active kickers and crawlers. Handmade in Rogers, Arkansas.

Each pair of shoes are made one at a time to ensure premium quality. Please take the time to measure your or your child‚Äôs footprint to ensure the correct size is ordered for a perfect fit. Please understand due to the custom-made nature of the item, we cannot accept returns for incorrect sizing.

Finding Your Size

From infant‚Äôs crib shoes to men‚Äôs work boots, shoes are sized according to length and width. Understanding how your foot compares to the standard sizes will ensure your shoes fit perfectly. *PLEASE NOTE! Different brands have minor variations in their ‚Äústandard‚Äù sizing, please order according to your measurement and not the suggested US shoe size. If you are in between sizes, we recommend sizing up!

How to Measure

To measure properly, you‚Äôll need a piece of paper larger than your foot, a pencil, and a measuring tape.
Stand and place the paper on the floor in front of you. If you like, you can tape the paper to the floor to keep it from sliding around. Put your foot on the paper.
Use a pencil to trace all the way around your foot. Try to keep the pencil perpendicular to the paper.
When you‚Äôve completely traced your foot, flip the paper over and trace your other foot on the reverse side.
Use a tape measure to find the length of your foot at its longest point.
Use these measurements to find your shoe size on the chart below.

Helpful Measuring Tips

Keep these tips in mind to help you get the best results from your measurement:
When measuring, wear the socks or tights you plan to wear with this pair of shoes.
Always trace and measure both feet, since it‚Äôs common for one foot to be a bit larger than the other. Use the largest foot to find your shoe size.
If you‚Äôre having trouble keeping your balance while tracing, do it next to a chair or table that you can hold to steady yourself. Some people also find it easier to have a friend trace the foot.

Perfect for both walkers and crawlers, these shoes stay put no matter how your baby moves! The soles provide traction helping to keep new walkers on their toes! Shoes are fully lined with super soft fleece, fits with or without socks. Fully encased ankle elastic will keep shoes on the most active kickers and crawlers. Handmade in Rogers, Arkansas.

Each pair of shoes are made one at a time to ensure premium quality. Please take the time to measure your or your child‚Äôs footprint to ensure the correct size is ordered for a perfect fit. Please understand due to the custom-made nature of the item, we cannot accept returns for incorrect sizing.

Finding Your Size

From infant‚Äôs crib shoes to men‚Äôs work boots, shoes are sized according to length and width. Understanding how your foot compares to the standard sizes will ensure your shoes fit perfectly. *PLEASE NOTE! Different brands have minor variations in their ‚Äústandard‚Äù sizing, please order according to your measurement and not the suggested US shoe size. If you are in between sizes, we recommend sizing up!

How to Measure

To measure properly, you‚Äôll need a piece of paper larger than your foot, a pencil, and a measuring tape.
Stand and place the paper on the floor in front of you. If you like, you can tape the paper to the floor to keep it from sliding around. Put your foot on the paper.
Use a pencil to trace all the way around your foot. Try to keep the pencil perpendicular to the paper.
When you‚Äôve completely traced your foot, flip the paper over and trace your other foot on the reverse side.
Use a tape measure to find the length of your foot at its longest point.
Use these measurements to find your shoe size on the chart below.

Helpful Measuring Tips

Keep these tips in mind to help you get the best results from your measurement:
When measuring, wear the socks or tights you plan to wear with this pair of shoes.
Always trace and measure both feet, since it‚Äôs common for one foot to be a bit larger than the other. Use the largest foot to find your shoe size.
If you‚Äôre having trouble keeping your balance while tracing, do it next to a chair or table that you can hold to steady yourself. Some people also find it easier to have a friend trace the foot.

item_name: Ecologies: Hidden Habitats - Gameplay Inspired by Nature - Sequel and Expansion to the Original Card Game - Beautiful Vintage Scientific Art
desc:
ECOLOGIES: HIDDEN HABITATS is available now!

The third game in the series, it is playable as a stand alone game or used in combination with the previous two ECOLOGIES card games.

Players build and maintain food webs in diverse environments. Healthy ecologies reward you with bonus powers and perks. Watch out though, as others may decide it‚Äôs easier to disturb and degrade your ecosystem than nurture their own.

Designed by a biology teacher, the game includes 76 unique organisms, 7 biomes, and beautiful vintage Victorian art. (108 cards total)

Players: 1-6
Ages: 12+ (8+ with simplified rules)
Time: 60-90 minutes
Game Modes: Standard, Simplified, Single Player

Cards are arranged with plants/algae on the bottom and predators on top. Players negotiate trades and use biotic and abiotic factor cards to affect their webs and the webs of players around them. It is a race to get to 12 victory points, with players using different strategies such as focusing on one biome, going for perks and bonuses, or disrupting other ecologies.

Gameplay is rooted in authentic science, as it is used in the classroom to teach real concepts to biology students. While it is scientific enough for the classroom, it is also strategic enough for any game night.

The points system is based on ecological trophic levels. The producers (plants) are worth less and as you make your way up the pyramid organisms are worth more, as it takes a lot of energy to sustain them. In real life only roughly 10% of the energy makes it from one level to the next, meaning you have to have acres of land and hundreds of animals just to sustain one apex predator.

This game is a sequel AND an expansion. When using the game as an expansion, you can customize the deck to include cards from all three games, including cards you love and excluding ones you don‚Äôt. Some players love aggressive ‚Äútake that‚Äù mechanics, while others find them stressful. Some players love particular healthy ecology bonuses, while others feel they are overpowered. With multiple decks, you can create a customized experience to fit your group.

If you‚Äôd like to maintain the same game length and feel, we recommend choosing 10 factor cards and 7 different biomes.

Note: more cards = a longer game

item_name: Seagull Plush Soft Toy Handmade Seagull Toy, Seagull Stuffed Toy, Gift for Newborn Stuffed Animal, Northern Gull Stuffed Toy, Christmas Gift
desc:
SEAGULLS:
Seagull is a type of sea bird. There are over 20 species of seagulls that can be found all over the planet. Seagulls are very old creatures. They exist on the planet at least 30 to 33 million years. Smallest species of these birds can reach 11.5 inches in length and 4.2 ounces of weight while larger species can reach 30 inches in length and 3.8 pounds of weight. Seagulls are one of the rare animals that are able to drink salt water. They are very intelligent birds. They use bread crumbs to attract fish and produce rain-like sound with their feet to attract earthworms hidden under the sands. Our seagull toys are very adorable and soft and can be loved by all ages.

ABOUT THIS PRODUCT:
This adorable stuffed animal is so premium. They are coming in 3 colors and 2 sizes. Our double stitch sewing technique provides a more durable plush toy so it won't rip easily.

Since our toys are collectibles and handmade, to keep them forever, we recommend to spot clean / hand wash this toy.
You may also want to put them into washing machine / dryer, but it is recommended to be hand-washed / air dry to keep your stuffed toy in a very best shape for many years.

We are located in the greater Boston area and proudly offer the cuddliest lovable plush toy in the world.

At SHAD, we test each individual category in a third party CPSC- accepted laboratories. We guarantee our selection goes beyond U.S. Consumers Product Safety Commission and CANADA Consumer Product Safety Act. (ASTM F963-17) & (SOR/2011-17).

WHAT YOU CAN CHANGE ON TEMPLATES:

WHAT YOU CAN NOT CHANGE ON TEMPLATES

PRINT OPTIONS:

(copy the link in your web browser)

RETURNS:

TERMS OF USE
